description: The versatility of Gamma AR softshell – our all-mountain, do-anything designs – gets warmer so you can keep going when temperatures drop. Combining outstanding stretch with wind resistance and water repellency, the durable, comfortable Wee Burly™ Double Weave has a brushed backer for added warmth and softness. Articulation works with the stretch to extend freedom of movement, the cuff fits over your mountaineering boots, and pockets include a harness-accessible one at the thigh.
name: Arcteryx Gamma AR Brushed Pants, Reg - Mens
